Package me.normanmaurer.niosmtp

Interface Summary
DeliveryRecipientStatus Status for the delivery of an email to a recipient
DeliveryResult Result of an email delivery
SMTPClient A client which deliver email via SMTP
SMTPClientConfig Configuration which is used to deliver email via SMTP
SMTPClientFuture A Future which allows to register SMTPClientFutureListener and also make it possible to access the DeliveryResult objects in a blocking fashion.
SMTPClientFutureListener A listener which will get informed once the SMTP delivery was done
SMTPRequest A SMTP Request which is send to the SMTP-Server
SMTPResponse The SMTP Response which is send back from the SMTP Server to the client
 

Enum Summary
DeliveryRecipientStatus.Status  
SMTPCommand The different SMTP Commands
 

Exception Summary
SMTPConnectionException SMTPException which will get thrown if the connection was timed out or refused
SMTPException Base Exception class for the SMTP Client
SMTPIdleException SMTPException which will get thrown if the connection did idle for to long.
